job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You will help to significantly shape Miro's Core product and have a high impact on the daily lives of 45M+ knowledge workers collaborating and driving team alignment with our features!

   You will be working with Miro top initiatives to integrate generative AI capabilities with core user flows and help shaping the collaboration workspace.

What you'll do

     * Design and development on Miro canvas components
     * Integrate canvas components with in-house generative AI models
     * Add functionality and drive improvements to microservices-based APIs
     * Contribute to development and execution of technical strategy
     * Help with the hiring of new talent
     * Be a role model, technically strong to mentor other engineers in the team
job_details.full_text:
Staff Software Engineer (Miro AI)

You will help to significantly shape Miro's Core product and have a high impact on the daily lives of 45M+ knowledge workers collaborating and driving team alignment with our features!

   You will be working with Miro top initiatives to integrate generative AI capabilities with core user flows and help shaping the collaboration workspace.

What you'll do

     * Design and development on Miro canvas components
     * Integrate canvas components with in-house generative AI models
     * Add functionality and drive improvements to microservices-based APIs
     * Contribute to development and execution of technical strategy
     * Help with the hiring of new talent
     * Be a role model, technically strong to mentor other engineers in the team

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes integrating generative AI capabilities with core user flows, designing and developing on Miro canvas components, and integrating these with in-house generative AI models. This aligns strongly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer who focuses on developing and deploying applications built on generative models and building production-grade user-facing software systems. While there's mention of microservices-based APIs and technical strategy, the core focus remains on the application of GenAI within the product.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design and development on Miro canvas components' and 'Add functionality and drive improvements to microservices-based APIs' directly relates to building and maintaining software applications and services.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and development on Miro canvas components

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Add functionality and drive improvements to microservices-based APIs' directly relates to building and maintaining software applications and services.
job_tasks.phrase: Add functionality and drive improvements to microservices-based APIs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Integrate canvas components with in-house generative AI models' indicates direct work with and application of generative AI models, which falls under the modeling category.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrate canvas components with in-house generative AI models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'help shaping the collaboration workspace' and 'Contribute to development and execution of technical strategy' implies understanding the product's direction and contributing to its strategic technical roadmap.
The phrase 'Contribute to development and execution of technical strategy' implies understanding the product's direction and contributing to its strategic technical roadmap.
job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to development and execution of technical strategy

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Be a role model, technically strong to mentor other engineers in the team' implies guiding and supporting other team members, which is a form of technical leadership and collaboration.
job_tasks.phrase: Be a role model, technically strong to mentor other engineers in the team
